data.enText: to show the image of sb/sth on the surface of sth such as a mirror, water or glass
His face was reflected in the mirror.

data.chText: 她在他的眼中看到了自己的样子。
data.enText: She could see herself reflected in his eyes.
to throw back light, heat, sound, etc. from a surface

data.chText: 窗户反射着午后明媚的阳光。
data.enText: The windows reflected the bright afternoon sunlight.

data.chText: 太阳光线照射到地球时，大量的热被反射回太空。
data.enText: When the sun's rays hit the earth, a lot of the heat is reflected back into space.

data.chText: 显示，表明，表达（事物的自然属性或人们的态度、情感等）
data.enText: to show or be a sign of the nature of sth or of sb's attitude or feeling

data.chText: 我们的报纸旨在表达当地人民的心声。
data.enText: Our newspaper aims to reflect the views of the local community.
to think carefully and deeply about sth

data.chText: 在作出决定以前，我需要时间认真考虑考虑。
data.enText: Before I decide, I need time to reflect.

data.chText: 由她负责考虑她这个决定会牵扯哪些问题。
data.enText: She was left to reflect on the implications of her decision.

data.chText: 回家的路上，他琢磨着这次面试非常顺利。
data.enText: On the way home he reflected that the interview had gone well.
reflect well, badly, etc. on sb/sth

data.chText: 使给人以好的（坏的或其他）印象
data.enText: to make sb/sth appear to be good, bad, etc. to other people

data.chText: 这一事件给所有相关人士都造成了恶劣影响。
data.enText: This incident reflects badly on everyone involved.

simple_means.memory_skill: re 回；向后 + flect 弯曲 →〔光线〕向回弯曲 → 反射

means: 显示，表明，表达(事物的自然属性或人们的态度、情感等)

data.enText: reflect well, badly, etc. on sb/sth

data.chText: 使给人以好的（坏的或其他）印象
data.enText: to make sb/sth appear to be good, bad, etc. to other people

data.chText: 这一事件给所有相关人士都造成了恶劣影响。
data.enText: This incident reflects badly on everyone involved.

example: I mulled over the events of the afternoon
philosophers have speculated on the question of God for thousands of years
The scientist must stop to observe and start to excogitate

tr: give evidence of the quality of
example: The mess in his dorm room reflects on the student

tr: give evidence of a certain behavior
example: His lack of interest in the project reflects badly on him

tr: to throw or bend back (from a surface)
example: Sound is reflected well in this auditorium
This action reflects his true beliefs

tr: be bright by reflecting or casting light

value.def: If something reflects an attitude or situation, it shows that the attitude or situation exists or it shows what it is like.

example.ex: The Los Angeles riots reflected the bitterness between the black and Korean communities in the city...
example.tran: 洛杉矶的暴乱反映出这个城市的黑人社区和韩裔社区之间的仇恨。

example.ex: Concern at the economic situation was reflected in the government's budget.
example.tran: 政府的预算反映了对经济运行状况的关注。

value.def: When light, heat, or other rays reflect off a surface or when a surface reflects them, they are sent back from the surface and do not pass through it.

example.ex: The sun reflected off the snow-covered mountains...
example.tran: 冰雪覆盖的山峰反射着阳光。

example.ex: The glass appears to reflect light naturally.
example.tran: 玻璃似乎可以自然反射光线。

value.def: When something is reflected in a mirror or in water, you can see its image in the mirror or in the water.

example.ex: His image seemed to be reflected many times in the mirror.
example.tran: 那面镜子里好像映现出很多个他的影像。

value.def: When you reflect on something, you think deeply about it.

example.ex: We should all give ourselves time to reflect...
example.tran: 我们都应该给自己时间好好想想。

example.ex: I reflected on the child's future.
example.tran: 我认真考虑了孩子的将来。

value.def: You can use reflect to indicate that a particular thought occurs to someone.

example.ex: Things were very much changed since before the war, he reflected.
example.tran: 情况与战前大不同了，他想。

value.def: If an action or situation reflects in a particular way on someone or something, it gives people a good or bad impression of them.

example.ex: The affair hardly reflected well on the British...
example.tran: 这个事件很难让人们对英国人有好印象。

example.ex: Your own personal behavior as a teacher, outside of school hours, reflects on the school itself.
example.tran: 作为教师，你在课堂以外的个人行为会影响人们对学校的印象。

trans: 反思；考虑；反省；思考；反省你自己所做的事

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 向下 + flect 弯曲 → 向下弯 → 偏斜
flex 弯曲 + ible 能…的 → 易弯曲的；灵活的
in 使… + flect 弯曲 → 使弯曲
in 不 + flexible 易弯曲的；灵活的 → 不可弯曲的；不屈服的
re 反 + flect 弯曲 →〔光线〕向回返 → 反射
re 回；向后 + bound 跳跃 → 回弹
re 回；向后 + call 想起 → 回忆
re 回；向后 + claim 要求 → 要求拿回 → 取回
re 回；向后 + flect 弯曲 →〔光线〕向回弯曲 → 反射
re 回；向后 + gress 走 → 倒退
re 回；向后 + juven 年轻 + ate 做，造成，使… → 回到年轻状态 → 返老还童
re 回；向后 + pel 推 → 驱除；击退
re 回；向后 + son 声音 + ant …的 → 回声的 → 回响的
re 回；向后 + tract 拉 → 拉回 → 缩回
re 回；向后 + turn 转动 → 向后转 → 返回
re 相反；反对；不 + action 行动 → 反动；反应
re 相反；反对；不 + bel 战斗 → 反过来打〔自己人〕→ 反叛
re 相反；反对；不 + move 移动 → 往反方向移动 → 移开
re 相反；反对；不 + neg 否认 + ade 表人 → 反过来否认〔自己人〕的人 → 叛徒
re 相反；反对；不 + peal 呼吁 → 不呼吁 → 取消
re 相反；反对；不 + prob 正直 + ate 表人 → 不正直的人 → 堕落者
re 相反；反对；不 + sent 感觉 → 反感 → 不满
re 相反；反对；不 + sist 站 → 反抗，抵抗
re 相反；反对；不 + vers 转 + e → 反转的，颠倒的
re 相反；反对；不 + volt 转 → 反转过来〔对抗自己人〕→ 反叛
re 一再，重新 + appear 出现 → 再出现
re 一再，重新 + arrange 安排 → 重新安排
re 一再，重新 + assure 放心 → 一再让人放心 → 消除（某人）疑虑
re 一再，重新 + birth 出生 → 再生，新生
re 一再，重新 + commend 赞扬 → 一再赞扬 → 推荐
re 一再，重新 + compense 补偿 → 一再补偿 → 赔偿
re 一再，重新 + examination 考试 → 复试
re 一再，重新 + furbish 磨光，擦亮 → 再磨光
re 一再，重新 + gener 产生 + ate 使… → 重新产生〔自我〕→ 改过自新的
re 一再，重新 + number 编号码 → 重新编号
re 一再，重新 + print 出版 → 再版
re 一再，重新 + production 生产 → 再生产
re 一再，重新 + surg 升起 + ence 表行为 → 重新升起 → 复兴
